## Tile.forceHasGeometry() method

Overrides the default value for \[\[hasGeometry\]\] if value is not `undefined`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
forceHasGeometry(value: boolean | undefined): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | boolean \| undefined | A new value for the \[\[hasGeometry\]\] flag. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
